name: Pong (But Harder)
description:
This is my first ever Unity game, and it is made purely within unity, I used no external sprite / modelling tools, and only used my already existing coding skills. (used external for music though) I know it is not optimized and has many bugs, but I just want to put something out there for myself. Enjoy! Constructive Criticism is appreciated! 

Will perhaps update in the future, but I also have some other game ideas I have planned :P

Comment any *Major* bugs and I will have them fixed as soon as possible

Current Version: 1.0

Last Updated 11/14/21
